Recipe.title: Green Bean Casserole
Recipe.Source: From the kitchen of Campbell's Soup
Recipe.Description: Ransom doesn't care much for this dish, but he can eat it to avoid getting in trouble. &smiley; However, most other people do like this dish.

section.instruction: Mix Soup, Milk, Soy Sauce, Pepper and half of the of French's Fried Onions (approximately 1⅓ Cups).
Remove from oven and sprinkle the remaining French's Fried Onions evenly across the top, then bake for an additional 5 minutes.

Notes.note: You can make just an 8" × 8" by doing ½ a batch. (But you'll probably want more than just ½ of the French's Fried Onions for the top.)

Modifications.modification: Add ½ Cup Chopped Red Bell Pepper in Step 2.

Add ½ Cup Shredded Cheese in Step 2.
Then sprinkle some more on top before adding the French's Fried Onions in Step 6.
